metadata.public_alias: the public alias of the other account holder
metadata.private_alias: the private alias of the other account holder
metadata.more_info: short text explaining who the other party of the transaction is
metadata.URL: a URL related to the other party e.g. the website of the company
metadata.image_URL: an image URL related to the other party e.g. company logo
metadata.open_corporates_URL: the company corporate URL in the http://opencorporates.com/ web service

corporate_location.date: date of posting the geo tag

user.provider: name of party that authorized the user e.g. bank_name/facebook/twitter
user.id: ID (given by the user's provider) of the user making the comment

physical_location.date: date of posting the geo tag

user.provider: name of party that authorized the user e.g. bank_name/facebook/twitter
user.id: ID (given by the user's provider) of the user making the comment
